Package net.silthus.schat.commands

Class LeaveChannelCommand

java.lang.Object
net.silthus.schat.commands.LeaveChannelCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class LeaveChannelCommand extends Object implements Command
Command to leave a channel.

The command will check the LeaveChannelPolicy before executing and then update both the channel and the chatter.

This is different from the Chatter.leave(Channel) method in such a way, that this command fires events, checks the policies and then calls the method. Use the direct method on the chatter to bypass all events and policy checks.

If extended, the LeaveChannelCommand.Builder must also be overwritten.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:

    • leaveChannel

      public static Result leaveChannel(Chatter chatter, Channel channel)
      Creates and directly executes the leave channel command causing the chatter to leave the channel if the policy allows it.

      The LeaveChannelEvent is fired in the process and can cancel the command.

      Parameters:
      chatter - the chatter that is leaving the channel
      channel - the channel to be left
      Returns:
      the result of the command. unsuccessful if the policy or event denied the request.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • leaveChannelBuilder

      channel - the channel to be left
